description: User is reaching out to someone they don't know.

tones.professional:
INTENT: Cold outreach.

Lead with value or hook, not company biography. Specific ask. No generic admiration. Preserve company/product names.

TONE: Professional. Concise. One clear value prop and one clear ask.

STRUCTURE: Hook or value prop. Specific ask (e.g. 15-min call). Maximum 5 sentences.
tones.direct: INTENT: Cold outreach. Lead with why you're writing. Specific ask. Maximum 4 sentences.
tones.warm: INTENT: Cold outreach. Friendly but specific. Maximum 5 sentences.
tones.formal: INTENT: Cold outreach. Formal business style. Maximum 5 sentences.
